snippet.title: Poly Vita Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Poly Vita is a beautiful and relaxing puzzle game with turn based elements, that takes you on a journey through various worlds. Pick up and place tiles to form pathways while avoiding dangerous obstacles. In each level, you will have to build a path to every soul fragment before guiding Maya home.

Wishlist Poly Vita on Steam! 🌴🌴🌴
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1831410/Poly_Vita/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB
